HOME_HERO.MOTTO_FIRST_PART: From this world we leave only with
HOME_HERO.DESCRIPTION: We are support, with all our might, for those who have no one else to lean on. Our mission is to bring joy to the hearts of as many people as possible, both young and old, together with you.

HOME_ACTIVITY.TITLE: Our Activity
HOME_ACTIVITY.DESCRIPTION: Dear people, all our activity, all assets, including the existence of this association are due to you, they are yours, we only use them carefully, wisely and for a noble purpose. So all the praise and congratulations on which you address to us, we share them with you, because without you we would not exist and without each other we would not have achieved anything of all that we have achieved!

SAINT_JOHN.TITLE: Saint John The Merciful Center
SAINT_JOHN.DESCRIPTION: Together we save lives, change destinies, heal souls. Each of us has gone through a dark period at least once in our life from which we no longer knew how to get out or when it would end. We saw our family, friends, loved ones in our lives suffering and we had no way to help them. How much help is given with empathy, with affection and love. In those moments you need support and I strongly believe that the team of the St. John The Merciful Center will strive to bring relief, healing and be a support to those who will tell us: "Help!".
SAINT_JOHN.IMAGE_ALT: Icon of Saint John the Merciful Center

HOME_POTENTIAL.TITLE: They are also ours
HOME_POTENTIAL.DESCRIPTION: I have met hundreds of children, some of them live in the city, others in the villages, some in the fields or in the canals, or suffer from cancer, leukemia or severe forms of paralysis. HOWEVER, they all have the same thing in common, they are INNOCENT, and they all want the same thing, to be loved, as each of us wants. Help us help them!

HOME_HELP.TITLE: Other ways of helping
HOME_HELP.DESCRIPTION: There are other ways of helping. Here are some ways you can contribute:

FIRST.TITLE: Material goods
FIRST.DESCRIPTION: Donate clothing, food, medicine, hygiene products, books, toys, furniture, or other goods that could benefit families or children!

SECOND.TITLE: Forms
SECOND.DESCRIPTION: Complete form 230 to redirect 3.5% of your income tax, or download the sponsorship contract.

THIRD.TITLE: Volunteering
THIRD.DESCRIPTION: If you have some free time and want to get involved, you can become a volunteer and help us in our activities. Every help matters!

HOME_BLOG.TITLE: Blog
HOME_BLOG.DESCRIPTION: Here you can find some articles about various topics. We hope you will find them interesting and useful.

OUR_TEAM.TITLE: Our Team
OUR_TEAM.DESCRIPTION: Meet our team! We are passionate people when it comes to our work and we wish to bring a positive impact in the world.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Discover some of our projects and find out how you can help those who need you.

TABLE_OF_JOY.TITLE: Meals of Joy
TABLE_OF_JOY.DESCRIPTION: Have you ever been in a situation where you had nothing to eat, for at least a day? Through this program, 'Meals of Joy', we offer food to thousands of people. You too can offer a meal to a needy person and in return, you will receive the most sincere THANK YOU of your life. Who do we help? Families with many children, people without income, widowed women, sick individuals raising their children alone, people with mobility issues, both adults and children, socially assisted children, lonely elderly, homeless people. They fast even when it is not the fasting season.

LOVE_AND_MEDICINE.TITLE: Love & medicine
LOVE_AND_MEDICINE.DESCRIPTION: Do you want to be friends? These children feed on our love and live on medicine. What needs do these children have? Some need treatment, others prostheses, others mobile cart or surgery. Help them to stop needing treatment and be left with only love and joy that they have healed with your help. NOTE - the money obtained from donations will only be redirected to the account of the hospital or clinic and the posting of related invoices/costs on the website of the Bucurie √én Dar (Gift of Joy) Association.

SCHOOL_OF_JOY.TITLE: School of Joy
SCHOOL_OF_JOY.DESCRIPTION: The children helped today are the educated adults of tomorrow. Education is fundamental. And by supporting these children and their access to education, you also help the community and support the contribution they will bring to the community and to this country. With your help these children will discover the world, a world different from the one they live in now. Through them you will be happy too! Also, we all know that in Romania the phenomenon of bullying has increased, and many children are victims. We believe that it is easier to prevent than to fight a phenomenon and that together we can help the little ones to have healthy relationships with their peers. We share with you the workshops project "School of Joy", which starts from a story - "The Heart of the Hedgehog". An adventure in search of true friends" (author: Mariana Buric). The workshop contains games and activities that can be done with children by teachers, in kindergartens and schools, but also by parents at home. We would be happy if among you there are teachers and parents who want to join us in this project. Let's help the little ones enjoy going to kindergarten or school and enjoy the friendship of their peers. Of the 300 children we support at school with your help, not one has dropped out of school!

STREET_PEOPLE.TITLE: Street people
STREET_PEOPLE.DESCRIPTION: People of the street or bums! That's what we call these people and that's what I used to call them, now I call them my friends, yes, yes, my friends. These people who live on the streets, some of them were teachers, intellectuals, others were too good with their children and kicked out of the house, some as a result of disappointments, the death of children, they ended up under the open sky, but they are freer than many of us. Some of them, abandoned in the hospital, raised in children's homes or left to their own devices. They usually don't look you in the eye when you give them food, they look down, but when they get to look at you and thank you, know that it's the most sincere thank you received from a human and you've done a merciful deed before God! Whenever our life can change, let's be thankful for what we have and not forget them. You help through us. Together with the First Responder, we feed and treat them as best we can. Help us help them!

ADOPT_A_FAMILY.TITLE: Adopt a family
ADOPT_A_FAMILY.DESCRIPTION: Help at least one of our small and large friends, young or old. Dear people, you have the opportunity to adopt a family to take care of, helping them in their needs and helplessness. Any help, no matter how small, is welcome. Call us to provide you with their contact details. Ensure what you can from the needs of a disadvantaged family: a medicine or a box of milk powder, basic food items, a notebook or a pencil for a student, are things that, unfortunately, some cannot afford on a constant basis. We make the cases known to you, and you choose the family you wish to visit and help in the medium or long term.

HELP_A_COMMUNITY.TITLE: Help a community
HELP_A_COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: We are involved in helping many communities, our friends we now say with joy, are hundreds of families, wonderful people, and many beautiful children. Whatever good thing you have to offer, such as food, medicine (cough syrups, fever reducers, diapers, etc.), footwear, clothing, personal hygiene and intimate hygiene products, toys, appliances, furniture, and other goods, we await you every day at the two collection points located at the following addresses: Supermarket La Coco»ô, inside the store. ABOUT.TITLE: About us
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Who we are, what we do, and why we do it.

WHO_ARE_WE.TITLE: Who are we?
WHO_ARE_WE.DESCRIPTION: We are volunteers who, after several years of humanitarian activities, founded the Bucurie √Æn Dar (Gift of Joy) Association to help on a larger scale. We are people who live for others, not just for ourselves. With the help of The Good Lord and with your support, in a joint work, we want to bring joy to the hearts of many people, big and small, young and old. We have the freedom to choose what we do in this life, and we chose to help, and we do it with all the joy and love. Give joy too, together with us.

WHAT_WE_DO.TITLE: What we do?
WHAT_WE_DO.DESCRIPTION: We listen to the life stories of those who are less important to a part of society. We are support, with everything in our power, for those who have no one left to lean on. We help those who shout: help us! Choose to help with us! It's that simple. Just choose.

WHY_WE_HELP.TITLE: Why we help?
WHY_WE_HELP.DESCRIPTION: Because we have the power to choose what we do with our time, with our lives. The legacy we leave to our children are our deeds, which they also pass on. Dear people, from this life, we only leave with our deeds. You who come and help, sacrifice your time, your comfort and your money for people you don't know. You chose to give your life to your neighbor. This is the gift and it comes from love.

1.TITLE: The Importance of Charitable Donations
1.DESCRIPTION: In a world full of uncertainty and challenges, acts of charity shine like beacons of hope and humanity. Charity is not just a gesture of compassion; it is a bridge that connects souls, offering those less fortunate a chance at a better life. Charitable donations are vital for supporting this noble cause, and here's why. Direct Impact on People's Lives Through donations made to charitable organizations, we contribute directly to improving the lives of those in need. Whether it's food, shelter, education, or access to medical services, every donated dollar can make the difference between despair and hope for someone. Strengthening the Community Our donations help build and strengthen the community. When we support charitable causes, we join forces with other donors and volunteers to fight against inequalities and to create a fairer and more compassionate society. Education for Future Generations Donations in the field of education ensure that future generations will have the necessary resources to learn and thrive. Education is the foundation upon which the future is built, and our support can open doors that would otherwise remain closed. Personal Fulfillment Donations are not just about giving; they're also about receiving. The personal fulfillment and inner peace we feel when helping others are priceless. It's proof that, regardless of our own difficulties, we can make a positive difference in the world. Positive Influence Through our example, we inspire others to be generous and to engage in acts of charity. Generosity is contagious, and when we show our support for charitable causes, we motivate those around us to do the same. In conclusion, charitable donations are much more than a simple transfer of financial resources. They are our expression of solidarity and empathy towards those in need. Every contribution, no matter its size, matters and has the power to transform lives. So, let's open our hearts and be generous. Every act of charity is a seed of goodness planted for a brighter future.

2.TITLE: The Importance of Mental Health and Well-Being
2.DESCRIPTION: In today's tumultuous times, mental health has become a crucial topic in discussions about well-being. Maintaining mental health is not just about preventing or treating specific conditions, but it's about creating a balance in our daily lives that allows us to realize our potential and cope with everyday stress. Mental health influences the way we think, feel, and act. Therefore, it is essential to take time for self-care and to seek support when necessary. Creating a supportive environment around us, where open dialogue about emotions and internal struggles is encouraged, can have a significant impact on our well-being. Activities such as meditation, physical exercises, and creative hobbies can contribute to improving mental health. It's also important to recognize that seeking professional help is a sign of strength, not weakness. In the end, mental health is not a destination but a continuous process of growth and adaptation, and every step we take to care for our minds is a step towards a more fulfilled and happier life.
